Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 10/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
